column5: Looking for some feedback on this line. Saw it in a magazine, but havent seen any local stores who carry it.  its to be used as a main line, no leader    http://www.tacklewarehouse.com/Sufix_Invisiline_Castable_Fluorocarbon/descpage-SCF.html

I see no benefit in having all fluoro on a spool. If you need stealth use a long leader of fluoro or mono. Really good fluoro sucks on a spool, and I don't like the compromises needed to make it manageable on a spool.
